prompt_blocks.background: Background: PURE WHITE #FFFFFF. No gradients. Extreme minimalism. Generous white space (at least 30% empty). Clean, bright, airy.
prompt_blocks.cards_content: Minimal cards with thin black border (1px solid #1A1A1A). Very subtle or no shadow. Sharp or slightly rounded corners (8px max). White background. Clean typography.
prompt_blocks.cards_headline: Simple black text on white. Clean sans-serif typography. ONE orange accent element only (#FF5A1F). No decorative borders or complex styling.
prompt_blocks.person_hook: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: simple white t-shirt or white minimalist clothing. Pose: [POSE]. Expression: [EMOTION], natural, understated. Lighting: flat even lighting, minimal shadows. Lots of white space around figure. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
